values: 人造卫星；天然卫星；卫星组织；附属物；附属企业；从属国；卫星社区；卫星城镇；辅助设备；附属设备；卫星电视；（显要人物的）追随者；仆从；侍卫；奉承于左右的人；爪牙；外围组织；附属企业；辅助机场
卫星的；人造卫星的；附属的
通过通信卫星传送；像卫星般沿轨道运行

synonym.mean: 卫星；人造卫星；随从；卫星国家

word_group.brief_definition: 天气卫星；气象卫星；气候卫星
卫星数据；卫星资料；卫星的数据
卫星图像；卫星影像；卫星图象
地球同步卫星；地球静止卫星；同步卫星
卫星信号；卫星讯号；卫星信号接收器
卫星链路；卫星联系；卫星链接
间谍卫星；侦查卫星；侦察卫星

bilingual.target: 美国国家航空航天局发射了一颗新卫星。

bilingual.source: As they watched, the satellite sank behind the nearest ridge.
bilingual.target: 当他们看着时，卫星沉到了最近的山脊后面。

bilingual.source: Today, satellite data and computer technology help scientists predict the weather more precisely.
bilingual.target: 如今，卫星数据和计算机技术帮助科学家更精确地预测天气。

bilingual.source: Miles was watching a round satellite with bright green lights when suddenly it changed direction.
bilingual.target: 迈尔斯正在看一个带有明亮绿灯的圆形卫星，突然它改变了方向。

bilingual.source: The sig from the satellite was weak.

bilingual.target: 卫星正在绕轨道运行地球。

bilingual.source: The scientist analyzed the tle to predict the satellite's orbit.
bilingual.target: 科学家分析了卫星的双行元素集来预测卫星的轨道。
卫星在地球周围轨道上运行。
科学家们发射了一颗新的卫星。

bilingual.source: A rocket can send a satellite into orbit.
bilingual.target: 火箭可以把卫星送入轨道。

list.abstract: 《Satellite》是本月少女演唱的一首歌曲，由ZNEE(153/Joombas)、Jaden Jeong作词，David Amber、Ashley Alisha(153/Joombas)作曲，收录在2019年2月19日发行的专辑《[X X]》中。

yingyinNormal.en: That means every cellphone, satellite, ATM machine, and computer, simultaneously.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也就是说，黑了所有手机，卫星，自动提款机和电脑，在同一时间。

yingyinNormal.en: He'd been talking to the muckety-mucks in Washington on his satellite phone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他之前一直用卫星电话和华盛顿的权威人士通话。

yingyinNormal.en: Exactly. But if you look at the satellite blowup, you can clearly see this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，但如果看看卫星地图，就能清楚的看到这个。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. What artificial satellite has seen glimpses of Einstein's predicted frame dragging? And of course, it's gravity probe B.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，哪颗人造卫星记录下了爱因斯坦预言的时空结构拖曳现象？答案是引力探测器B卫星。

yingyinNormal.en: We'll set up a satellite office limited to Mr. Stamper and myself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们会成立一个卫星监控办公室成员仅限我本人和斯坦普先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Satellite is up. Marine one is airborne. Southpaw is evaded. Good lord. Yes!
yingyinNormal.zh: 卫星就位了，海军一号已经起飞，左撇子正在撤离。太好了。太好了。

yingyinNormal.en: After that, he's back off the grid. Satellite map. Coordinates for where he'll be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 之后，他会消失得无影无踪，这是卫星地图，上面有他位置的坐标。

yingyinNormal.en: Good news. I made it onto the team for the new Defense Department laser-equipped surveillance satellite.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好消息来了，我入选了国防部新组建的激光监测卫星小组。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, if that's the case, Penny will have to get satellite TV and maybe once a week run a vacuum through this place.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那样的话，佩妮得装卫星电视，而且每周吸一吸灰尘。

yingyinNormal.en: Very good, Ender. Thermal imaging from a satellite. The enemy's in red. What pattern do you see?
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好，安德，这是卫星拍的热成像图，红色的是敌人，你找到什么规律了？

yingyinNormal.en: Also check the most recent satellite images for a red pick-up in the driveway. 54-09 on route.
yingyinNormal.zh: 同时搜索最新卫星图像，看谁家车道上停有红色皮卡，54-09正在赶来。

yingyinNormal.en: What I was going to suggest is if that you're willing to wait until Sunday morning, the Google satellite will be over Pasadena. You can have your wedding photographed from space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想建议的是，如果你们愿意等到星期天早上结婚，谷歌的卫星会经过帕萨迪纳上空，卫星将会从太空拍下你们婚礼的照片。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, so we know we're going to do it Sunday morning. Now we need to find a good place for the satellite to see us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，仪式的时间定在周日早上，现在得找一个卫星照得到我们的好位置。

yingyinNormal.en: Racing down fiber-optic cable at the speed of light to San Francisco, bouncing off a satellite in geosynchronous orbit to Lisbon, Portugal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 以光速在光纤电缆中传输到旧金山，再通过地球同步轨道卫星反射到葡萄牙的里斯本。

yingyinNormal.en: According to data from the European Space Agency's Gravity field and steady-state Ocean Circulation Explorer satellite, the loss of polar ice to climate change is affecting the gravitational environment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来自欧洲太空署地球重力场和海洋环流探测卫星的数据，气候变迁导致极区的冰融化，影响了引力环境。

yingyinNormal.en: At the end of the month's labor, every month, sixty inmates were selected. They were picked out to be sent from the satellite camp back to Auschwitz. That's right, isn't it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 每个月的劳动结束时六十个犯人被挑选出来。从周边的小集中营送返奥斯威辛。这没错吧？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an electronic device that is sent into space and moves around the earth or another planet. It is used for communicating by radio, television, or others and for providing information.

examination_example.sentence: Ferraro analyzed <highlight>satellite</highlight> data showing annual forest loss from 2008 to 2012—including during Indonesia's phase-in of the antipoverty program—in 7,468 forested villages across 15 provinces.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Ferraro分析了显示2008年至2012年期间每年森林损失的卫星数据，其中包括印度尼西亚在15个省份的7468个森林村庄逐步实施脱贫计划期间的数据。

sense_info_list.en: a town, a country or an organization that is controlled by and depends on another larger or more powerful one
a natural object that moves around a larger natural object in space
surrounding and dominated by a central authority or power
a portion of the DNA of a genome with repeating base sequences and of different density from the main sequence

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an electronic device that is sent into space and moves around the earth or another planet. It is used for communicating by radio, television, or others and for providing information

examination_example.sentence: An old Russian craft slammed into a communications <highlight>satellite</highlight>, creating a cloud of hundreds of pieces of debris.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一架古老的俄罗斯飞船与一颗通信卫星相撞，形成了数百片碎片的云团。

examination_example.sentence: Officials at the White House announced a new space policy focused on managing the increasing number of <highlight>satellites</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 白宫官员宣布了一项新的太空政策，着重于管理不断增加的卫星数量。

examination_example.sentence: The oldest <highlight>satellite</highlight> still in orbit - Vanguard 1 - turned 60 in 2018.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前仍在轨道上运行的最古老卫星——先锋1号——在2018年年满60岁。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an electronic device that is sent into space and moves around the earth or another planet. It is used for communicating by radio; television; or others and for providing information.

examination_example.sentence: A NASA <highlight>satellite</highlight> orbiting over Portugal took photographs that reveal the effects of pollution from ships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一颗在葡萄牙上空运行的美国宇航局卫星拍摄的照片揭示了船舶污染的影响。

examination_example.sentence: What has caused the thick clouds in the photos taken by NASA <highlight>satellite</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是什么导致了NASA卫星拍摄的照片中的浓云？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I can, from my computer at home, pull up <highlight>satellite</highlight> images of Juan's village.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我可以用家里的电脑调出Juan所在村庄的卫星图像。

direction_info.description:

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 天气卫星；气象卫星；气候卫星

examination_example.sentence: The new <highlight>satellite</highlight> is designed to work for at most 12 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这颗新卫星被设计为最多工作12年。

examination_example.sentence: Where did China launch the last <highlight>satellite</highlight> of the third-generation network?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国第三代网络的最后一颗卫星在哪里发射？

examination_example.sentence: After a period of tests in space, this new satellite has started to work with other Beidou <highlight>satellites</highlight> together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经过一段时间的太空试验，这颗新卫星已经开始与其他北斗卫星协同工作。
